circumstances: Following an uneventful training flight in the region of Santa Barbara Airport, the aircraft belly landed, slid for few dozen yards and came to rest on the runway. All four occupants escaped uninjured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
The accident was caused by the combination of the following factors:
- The student pilot failed to extend the landing gear on approach, 
- Inadequate supervision of flight on part of the pilot-in-command, 
- The crew failed to use the approach checklist, 
- The landing gear warning horn was inoperative for undetermined reason.
